title: New client Login Theme
body: i don't know how we all feel but i'm sure i speak for some of us when i say i would like to see the animated login themes be added back into the 'new' clients login screen, the new logins theme is just a image and while it does look good, it does not compare or match some of the great animations and liveliness that the animated logins brang.{{item:4403}}

replies.body:
The idea with the new login flow is that most people won't even really see the loading screen (because of the save credentials option) once it's all up and fully running. 

So having animated splash arts, while nice, is kind of pointless, because it's making your PC load something reasonably resource-intensive (thus taking longer to load) that you'll generally see for less than a second if at all.

I absolutely adore the animated splashes, but if this means more things like say, the SG or New Dawn cinematics, I'm certainly not going to complain.
